content:
The story I created did not specify how many days it took for Pyrrhos to build the tower. However, it is likely that the construction process took a considerable amount of time, given the attention to detail and the care that Pyrrhos put into designing and building the tower.

Pyrrhos was said to have spent many years studying and experimenting with materials to create a magical substance that would be impervious to fire, and he likely spent additional time designing and building the tower itself. The tower was a significant undertaking, as it had to be large enough to accommodate Pyrrhos, his family, and two of every kind of animal, and it had to be designed to withstand the intense heat and flames of the coming fire.

Therefore, while the story did not provide a specific number of days or years, it's likely that Pyrrhos spent a considerable amount of time constructing the tower to ensure that it was as strong and secure as possible.
